channel.title: Vegas Pro 10.0
channel.description: I'm fairly familiar with vegas, i had vegas 9 but my computer had fucked up, had to get rid of it etc. So last night i went and downloaded it again, but this time it was 10.0. Its the same thing pretty much, few different things though. Anyways! I am having rendering problems.. When i click to render the video to a WMV file or an AVI File, so i can add it to youtube, it starts rendering at about the last 45 seconds of the video and will not start at the beginning.. If you know what is wrong or how to help it would help me a lot, thanks.

item.title: Vegas Pro 10.0
item.dc:creator: @k0_twin k0 twin
item.description:
@k0_twin wrote:

Do you recommend 10 over 9? I’m considering getting 10

item.title: Vegas Pro 10.0
item.dc:creator: @Motokid126 Motokid126
item.description:
@Motokid126 wrote:

CodyPkz™:

I had the same problem, just highlight all the clips

Beast man it worked, Thank you so much! Repped!
